content: crochet a coaster and help wateraid show uk policy-makers that you want action for clean water for all wateraid is asking people to create their own special mug rug following this simple crochet pattern of a water droplet they will share your coasters with mps and ministers during a day of action for water in westminster later in the year by crocheting your coaster you can show our elected representatives that their constituents are willing to dedicate their time for clean water
